issue.title: www.nefisyemektarifleri.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.nefisyemektarifleri.com/video/browni-tadinda-islak-kek-tarifi](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nefisyemektarifleri.com%2Fvideo%2Fbrowni-tadinda-islak-kek-tarifi) ### Comment > The video stays black for 5 sec and then starts. When video ended, next video will be the same. Without AdGuard there is no 5 sec black issue. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/IgViWD2.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/wfgCfNm.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.1.55 Browser: | Edge Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

AdGuard URL Tracking

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.nefisyemektarifleri.com/video/browni-tadinda-islak-kek-tarifi](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nefisyemektarifleri.com%2Fvideo%2Fbrowni-tadinda-islak-kek-tarifi) ### Comment > This rule fixed the problem: > nefisyemektarifleri.com##+js(set-constant, loadPlayerAds, trueFunc) ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/uUG8GYR.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/x2fjL42.jpg)

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://a2zapk.io/dload/1292756/file/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fa2zapk.io%2Fdload%2F1292756%2Ffile%2F) ### Comment > Adguard gets detected in https://a2zapk.io/ website and it's download links like this: > https://a2zapk.io/dload/1292756/file/ > Please fix this. > Thanks in advance. ### Screenshots

pull_request.title: Block sharecuts.cn
pull_request.body:
## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [ ] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [ ] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [ ] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Insults, spread rumors;
- [ ] Damage to the reputation of others;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons  share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances  pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

Block bad website sharecuts.cn

### Enter the issue address

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151551

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Your comment

https://sharecuts.cn/post/4344

There are insults, spread rumors, damage to the reputation of others,
and a large number of other bad content on this website.See the issue.

I sincerely hope that the Adguard team will support justice and approve and merge this PR to protect the rights of users.

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![IMG_0151](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/85857425/8a016d09-a0d5-4eae-a9d4-a702778b17d3)

</details>

### Terms

- [ ] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

comment.body: both of them work.

Excuse me.
I have checked with the Dev tool. 
But I think they are placeholder from google_ads_iframe.
I also think that `insiderintelligence.com/scripts/analytics/ads.js` is also a script that generates the frame for the ad.
Which rule is bad? Is it all of rules?
If you don't mind, could you please let me know?
